item.title: Manual of EXIOBASE V3.8 updates
item.description: v3.8 was released in November 2020, provided with a full re-estimate of the time-series (to 2021) that heavily relies on “now-casting” economic structure (and environmental extensions).

item.title: Linking Global Crop and Livestock Consumption to Local Production Hotspots
item.description: Identifying production hotspots for global crop and livestock consumption by a Spatially Explicit Multi-Reginal Input-Output model ( Zhongxiao’s work on Global Food Security).

item.title: Assessing the spatially explicit global footprints of European net-zero strategies
item.description: “Someone’s sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago” —Warren Buffett.
